_comment: Slow configuration with random crossover and grow mutation
_comment_profile: Thorough exploration with complexity-building operators - random crossover creates novel combinations while grow mutation increases expression complexity over time

_comment_crossover_descriptions.random: Creates new random subtrees at crossover points instead of exchanging existing ones

_comment_mutation_descriptions.grow: Extends terminal nodes into more complex subtrees to increase tree complexity

_comment_performance_notes.max_depth: Increased to 8 for complex expression evolution
_comment_performance_notes.population_size: Large population for extensive exploration and diversity maintenance
_comment_performance_notes.max_generations: Many generations for thorough convergence and complexity development
_comment_performance_notes.tournament_size: Increased to 5 for stronger selection pressure with high exploration
_comment_performance_notes.mutation_prob: Moderate mutation rate to balance grow operations with stability
_comment_performance_notes.complexity_focus: Configuration designed to evolve increasingly sophisticated feature expressions
_comment_performance_notes.exploration_depth: Random crossover maximizes novelty while grow mutation builds complexity progressively
